entry.title: Bitcoin API Wrapper
entry.summary: Krzysztof has developed a C++ wrapper for JSON-RPC communication with an existing Bitcoin installation. He believes that this could be useful for developers who are interested in building extensions or similar projects. The code for the wrapper is available on GitHub at https://github.com/minium/bitcoin-api-cpp. Krzysztof sent out this message to inform everyone about his project and to encourage others to use it.
